name: Air Time
description:
A flight so comfortable you'll wish it was longer.


Unfortunately when you book an average flight you don't have a lot of expectations; comfort is probably the last thing on your mind. Well luckily average is not what you're getting, now with Air Time when you schedule your travel we don't just transport you carelessly, you are home with our World-Class staff when we treat you like one of the family. With over 400 hours of on-demand entertainment, standard with absolutely every flight.¹






Regretfully we won't get to see you for all of your travel; we get terribly lonely flying back and forth all the time, so when you're with us you can guarantee every single one of your needs will be catered to², as though you were the Grand Archmageous Von Meowery herself. Frankly, we wish we could follow you to your hotel room, but that's illegal.





A Pickle is generally where you might find yourself, wandering from terminal to terminal getting lost between the seats with some of our less than positive competitors; they would have you believe that it's all just a part of the travel process. No more! Air Time offers practically stupid simple terminal service, so easy and carefree it should absolutely be a crime puni̊s̍̋hable by death in 4 of the 84 designated g̏ͫround sectors.



Site prettyness done by the prettiest: Takorii

¹ only available on select airbus' ² needs are determined by random selection
